name: Shogun 2200
description:
It's the year 2200 and Japan falls into a state of civil war and anarchy.

You are a one of the Shoguns and pushed the Enemy in to their last bastion.

Your goal is to solely fight through the masses of Enemies and seize control of their bastion.

Made for the Taku Mini Jam with the them Sci Fi Samurai

Sound effects taken from Freesound.org
